interactionGuidelines.description: The LLM should follow these guidelines throughout.

promptTemplate.definition: Used to initialise a thread. Contains project-specific details, rules on how an LLM should interact and how it should format periodic summaries (snapshots). This document is a prompt template.

thread.definition: The record of an interaction between a developer and an LLM. Contains the initial prompt template and a collection of snapshots.
thread.purpose: The thread serves as a breadcrumb trail through the development process, allowing both human developers and LLMs to retain context and coherence across multiple interactions. The developer is responsible for maintaining a record of the thread.

snapshot.definition: A specific interaction state representative of progress to date. A snapshot should conform to the snapshot schema.
